cast.name: 马太乌兹·巴纳斯乌克 Mateusz Banasiuk

introduction: Rising internet star Zosia, known under the nickname Just Sophie, discovers that her boyfriend, popular YouTuber Komfi, is having an affair. When the betrayal comes to light and Pudelek is exposed, the girl decides to accept the offer of Viola, adored by Internet users, and go on a foreign trip with her for sponsors' money. Visiting exclusive resorts in Cyprus, Ibiza, Malta, Greece and Italy, fighting for the reach and attention of fans, Zosia joins the elite of Polish influencers. Unfortunately, the love scandal with her ex-boyfriend becomes more and more loud when he becomes involved with the sexy fit-blogger Paula, and Viola's dark past comes back to haunt her. When juicy details and hidden secrets come to light, Zosia will be confronted with a difficult to accept truth about the environment she so desperately wanted to belong to.
